description.displayText: Imani was extremely kind, playful, and energetic with our children (1 and 3). She was extremely prompt, won them over with coloring books, and was exceptionally flexible with our scheduling needs. We were visiting from out of town, but she made our kids feel right at home. We'll be sure to reach out to her again next time we're in New York! Highly recommended!
description.originalText: Imani was extremely kind, playful, and energetic with our children (1 and 3). She was extremely prompt, won them over with coloring books, and was exceptionally flexible with our scheduling needs. We were visiting from out of town, but she made our kids feel right at home. We'll be sure to reach out to her again next time we're in New York! Highly recommended!

description.displayText: We hired Imani to watch our 5-yo and 9-month old while we were in NYC to host a party.  Imani was excellent.  She was punctual, communicative and proactive.  I left her instructions via email that she followed to a "T".  I also appreciated that when I told her our 5-yo liked matching games, she brought a matching game to play and leave behind!  She put our 9-month old to bed very easily.  She proactively asked if our children had any allergies.  She text us a couple times throughout the night to let us know how the kids were doing. Our 5-yo still talks about her "New York" babysitter and how much she liked her.  We will definitely hire Imani again.  She is awesome.

description.displayText: Imani is absolutely wonderful. She is all smiles and full of positive energy. She arrived work 15 minutes before the scheduled shift and kept me posted during the day about what's going on with my 18 months daughter. She took good care of my daughter and read books to her. I felt comfortable to let her take care of my daughter and would definitely hire her again.

description.displayText: Imani was a counselor at the camp I run.  She worked mainly with girls aged 6-9, but was also used as a class instructor for ages 6-16.  She was extremely personable and worked well with all ages.  She was very clear in her directions and also aware of risk management, which proved valuable when she was sent out into the Mountains to lead trips.  We would consider promoting her if she were to return to camp for another summer.  A fantastic person and a great employee.
